location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged in reverse chronological order.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 8; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located at the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between the Secretary of State for India, the Government of India, External Affairs Department, and HM Minister at Kabul, discussing proposed actions to be taken in response to intelligence received that Subhas Bose had crossed into Afghanistan.

name.namePart: Secretary of State for India, United Kingdom
Indian Political Service, External Affairs Department
